name: OhShape
summary: OhShape is a rhythm VR game where players have to move their full body to go through, punch or dodge walls following the beat of the music. It's an immersive game for all type of players inspired by the Japanese TV show Hole in the Wall.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: VR 音乐
  • 开发: Odders Lab
  • 发行: Odders Lab
  • 发行日期: 2019年12月14日
